text: Kaya tumhi tya lokanna nahi pahile, jyanna kanagosti karanyapasuna rokhale gele hote, tarihi te tya mana'i kelelya kamala punha karatata ani apasata aparadhacya, an'yayacya ani paigambarasi avajna karanyacya kanagosti karatata ani jevha tumacyajavala yetata, tevha tumhala tya sabdanta salama karatata, jya sabdanta allahane sangitale nahi, ani apalya manata mhanatata ki allaha amhala amacya asa bolanyavara siksa ka nahi deta? Tyancyasathi jahannama puresi ahe, jyata he loka dakhala hotila, tevha kiti va'ita thikana ahe
